If you are looking to improve your own data science skills or are interested in to hiring me to teach a data science workshop at your organization/company, I'm available for consulting!

The kinds of topics I love teaching include programming skills such as:

- R

- Python

- SQL

- Git/GitHub

- Shell/UNIX

As well as more general data science skills including:

- Data cleaning

- Data visualization

- Data science workflows

If any of that sounds like it might be a good fit for you, feel free to get in touch via email at rlbarter at gmail dot com!
